ProductInfo.Features:
KIT INCLUDES 14 PRODUCTS -- All BRAND NEW Items with all Manufacturer-supplied Accessories + Full USA Warranties:

<4> Transcend 64GB SDXC 10 Card + <5> Spare EN-EL15 Battery + <6> Battery Charger +
<7> 58mm UV Filter + <8> 67mm UV Filter + <9> Universal Pop-Up Diffuser + <10> Precision Design ML-L3 Remote +
<11> PD Laptop/Tablet DSLR Backpack + <12> PD 6pc Complete Cleaning Kit + <13> PD 8 SD Card Memory Card Case + <14> LCD Screen Protectors
